help-file.title: "DREAM TRAVEL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Caster and player(s) Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Teleportation
The spell dream travel is a VERY powerful teleportation type spell. Casting this spell on a player causes the caster to fall asleep and dream of his destination and when the caster wakes up he has arrived in most cases at whom he dreamed of. If the caster casts this spell on themselves every one in their group not in combat that has consented the caster will fall into a deep sleep causing them to dream of the caster and after wakening they will be in the same room as the caster.
syntax: cast 'dream travel' playername -to travel to any player on your side of the race wars.
cast 'dream travel' self or me -to cause all consented group members to travel to your location.
